title: Solidly Built House for Sale in Ragama.
details:
Solidly Built Two Storied House consisting 5 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms, Dining room, Living area, Pantry, Kitchen (Outside separate toilet).


Ground Floor consist 3 Bedrooms & Bathroom, living area, dining area and the kitchen

Fully tilled Upper Floor consist, 2 Bedrooms, 1 bathroom with attached (including a bath tub with 1 attached bathroom and pantry, kitchen and the dining area & balcony)
- Located in calm and peaceful, decent residential area
- Pipe water, well and fully ceiling
- Right round Parapet Wall
- 10 minutes drive to Ragama junction
- Easy access to famous Thewaththa Basilica Church

- Close proximity to Ragama Colombo North (Teaching Hospital), Medical Faculty and Rehabilitation Hospital.

- Please call for more details

Price Rs. 14750000 (Negotiable)
